Deprecated API

Contents
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
Deprecated Fields
com.tapjoy.TapjoyConnectFlag.SHA_2_UDID
          No longer supported. Sends the SHA2 hash of UDID/deviceID (IMEI/MEID/serial) in sha2_udid parameter instead of the udid parameter.
Use "true" as the flag value.
CAN ONLY BE USED IN THE ADVERTISER/CONNECT SDK. 
com.tapjoy.TapjoyDisplayAdSize.TJC_AD_BANNERSIZE_320X50
          Use TapjoyDisplayAdSize.TJC_DISPLAY_AD_SIZE_320X50 instead.

Banner size of 320x50 pixels 
com.tapjoy.TapjoyDisplayAdSize.TJC_AD_BANNERSIZE_640X100
          Use TapjoyDisplayAdSize.TJC_DISPLAY_AD_SIZE_640X100 instead.

Banner size of 640x100 pixels 
com.tapjoy.TapjoyDisplayAdSize.TJC_AD_BANNERSIZE_768X90
          Use TapjoyDisplayAdSize.TJC_DISPLAY_AD_SIZE_768X90 instead.

Banner size of 768x90 pixels 
 

Deprecated Methods
com.tapjoy.TapjoyConnect.enableBannerAdAutoRefresh(boolean)
          Use TapjoyConnect.enableDisplayAdAutoRefresh(boolean) instead.

Enables automatic refreshing of the banner ads. Default is FALSE. 
com.tapjoy.TapjoyConnect.enableVideoCache(boolean)
          This method is deprecated. Use the Tapjoy dashboard to enable or disable caching.

 
com.tapjoy.TapjoyConnect.getDailyRewardAd(TapjoyDailyRewardAdNotifier)
          No longer supported.

Retrieves the Daily Reward ad from the server. 
com.tapjoy.TapjoyConnect.getDailyRewardAdWithCurrencyID(String, TapjoyDailyRewardAdNotifier)
          No longer supported.

Retrieves the Daily Reward ad from the server. This should only be used if the application supports multiple currencies and is NON-MANAGED by Tapjoy. 
com.tapjoy.TapjoyConnect.getDisplayAd(TapjoyDisplayAdNotifier)
          No longer supported. Use TapjoyConnect.getDisplayAd(Activity, TapjoyDisplayAdNotifier) instead.

Retrieves the Banner Ad data from the server. Data is returned to the callback method TapjoyDisplayAdNotifier.getDisplayAdResponse(android.view.View). 
com.tapjoy.TapjoyConnect.getDisplayAdWithCurrencyID(String, TapjoyDisplayAdNotifier)
          No longer supported. Use TapjoyConnect.getDisplayAdWithCurrencyID(Activity, String, TapjoyDisplayAdNotifier) instead.

Retrieves the Banner Ad data from the server. Data is returned to the callback method TapjoyDisplayAdNotifier.getDisplayAdResponse(android.view.View). This should only be used if the application supports multiple currencies and is NON-MANAGED by Tapjoy. 
com.tapjoy.TapjoyConnect.getFeaturedApp(TapjoyFeaturedAppNotifier)
          Use TapjoyConnect.getFullScreenAd(TapjoyFullScreenAdNotifier) instead. Retrieves the Full Screen Ad data from the server. Data is returned to the callback TapjoyFeaturedAppNotifier. 
com.tapjoy.TapjoyConnect.getFeaturedAppWithCurrencyID(String, TapjoyFeaturedAppNotifier)
          Use TapjoyConnect.getFullScreenAdWithCurrencyID(String, TapjoyFullScreenAdNotifier) instead. Retrieves the Full Screen Ad data from the server. Data is returned to the callback TapjoyFeaturedAppNotifier. This should only be used if the application supports multiple currencies and is NON-MANAGED by Tapjoy. 
com.tapjoy.TapjoyConnect.initVideoAd(TapjoyVideoNotifier)
          This method now only sets the TapjoyVideoNotifier and starts caching (if allowed). Videos are initialized automatically now.

Initialize video ads so video offers can be made available via the offer wall. Call this method if you wish to enable video offers. 
com.tapjoy.TapjoyConnect.setBannerAdSize(String)
          Use TapjoyConnect.setDisplayAdSize(String) instead.

Sets the size (dimensions) of the banner ad. By default this is 640x100.
Supported sizes are:
TapjoyDisplayAdSize.TJC_AD_BANNERSIZE_320X50
TapjoyDisplayAdSize.TJC_AD_BANNERSIZE_640X100
TapjoyDisplayAdSize.TJC_AD_BANNERSIZE_768X90
 
com.tapjoy.TapjoyConnect.setFeaturedAppDisplayCount(int)
          No longer supported. Sets the maximum number of times the same full screen ad should be displayed. 
com.tapjoy.TapjoyConnect.showDailyRewardAd()
          No longer supported.

Displays the Daily Reward fullscreen ad. Should be called after TapjoyConnect.getDailyRewardAd(TapjoyDailyRewardAdNotifier) and after receiving the TapjoyDailyRewardAdNotifier.getDailyRewardAdResponse() callback. 
com.tapjoy.TapjoyConnect.showFeaturedAppFullScreenAd()
          Use TapjoyConnect.showFullScreenAd() instead. Displays the Full Screen Ad ad. Should be called after TapjoyConnect.getFeaturedApp(TapjoyFeaturedAppNotifier) and after receiving the TapjoyFeaturedAppNotifier.getFeaturedAppResponse(TapjoyFeaturedAppObject) callback.
